options.manifesto: Good Ear Music Supervision (GEMS) is a team of music curators dedicated to seeking out and shining light on the best songs the world has to offer. – Our craft is finding the perfect match between authentic songs and film.

pages.title: Home
pages.short_description: Good Ear Music Supervision (GEMS) is a team of music curators

video_collection.title: Note-Taker
video_collection.short_description: A short documentary for Microsoft's Note-Taker Technology, which assists low-vision students. Featuring... The Kills "Monkey 23," Galactic "Do It Again," and Wild Beasts "Two Dancers II."

video_collection.title: Zombie Roadkill
video_collection.short_description: For the final scene of this short film by Dave Green, produced by Ghost House Pictures, we were looking for an uplifting youthful anthem to give the sense that everything was returning to "normal" for the teenage lead and his zombie girlfriend. GEMS pitched and licensed Edward Sharpe & The Magnetic Zeros' "Janglin'" before the band's eventual rise to notoriety.

video_collection.title: Ham Sandwich
video_collection.short_description: Dave Green directed this short film for Comedy Central's CC Studios. It was a finalist for the 2012 Vimeo Awards in the Narrative Category.

video_collection.title: The Sopranos
video_collection.short_description: I worked as the Music Coordinator on the last season of the show from 2006-2007. I will always fondly remember my first ever sync - Ophir Prison Marching Kazoo Band's cover of Ricky Martin's "Livin' la Vida Loca" for a scene in which AJ Soprano gets dumped by his girlfriend at the Puerto Rican Day Parade. Ah, memories...

video_collection.title: History of Bling
video_collection.short_description: Critically acclaimed up-and-coming rap trio Pac Div wrote the lyrics, produced the beat, and starred in this online viral video for client Zambezi, directed by So Me. GEMS pitched and booked the talent, helped to tailor the music brief, and coordinated on production.

video.short_description: Dave Green directed this short film for Comedy Central's CC Studios. It was a finalist for the 2012 Vimeo Awards in the Narrative Category.

video.title: The Sopranos
video.short_description: I worked as the Music Coordinator on the last season of the show from 2006-2007. I will always fondly remember my first ever sync - Ophir Prison Marching Kazoo Band's cover of Ricky Martin's "Livin' la Vida Loca" for a scene in which AJ Soprano gets dumped by his girlfriend at the Puerto Rican Day Parade. Ah, memories...
